ValidationRule.description: Require Saver Rate Data when Stage/Status = Completed OR Status = Completed w/ Meeting Type = Enrollment Kit Only
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Completed"), NOT(INCLUDES( Meeting_Type__c , "Enrollment Kit only")),
(OR( ISBLANK( Number_of_Employees__c ), ISBLANK( Number_of_Eligible_Employees__c ), ISBLANK( Number_of_employees_contributing__c ), ISBLANK( Number_of_employees_with_a_balance__c ), ISBLANK( Terminated_Employees__c ), ISBLANK( Terminated_w_Balance__c ))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: One or more "Meeting Data" fields are missing. ALL fields in the left hand column of the Meeting Data section are required.
